body.name: Portable Self-Squeeze Mini Mop, Short Rotatable Hand Wash-Free Flat Squeeze Mop with Crevice Brush and 2 Reusable Microfiber Pads, Floor Cleaning System for Bathroom Kitchens Desktop (Gray)
features: 【Lazy Person's Self-Washing Flat Mop】The self-squeeze mop does not need to be matched with additional mop buckets. As long as you pull the sliding rod, the transverse scraper can effectively remove dirt and wring out moisture. Lift the mop bottom plate to automatically rebound. The integrated floor cleaning mop can free your hands and bring you an easy cleaning experience.

【Compact and Lightweight Design】Our portable self-squeezing mini mop has a stretch length of 19.3*6.3in, 260G, featuring light weight and small size, allowing you to clean it easily and store it easily. The small mop head storage size is perfect for tight spaces and on-the-go, such as small apartments, dorm rooms, and RVs.

【Strong Adsorption】Microfiber water-locking mop, ideal mop for wet and dry, wet mopping quickly absorbs sewage, dry mopping strong electrostatic adsorption, water absorption, and decontamination, a cloth to get it done, to achieve a detailed cleaning mopped the floor with a rag as clean as a hand wipe! All pads are machine washable. Reusable cleaning mop pads can save you a lot of money.

【All Purpose Squeegee】The back of the mop is equipped with a squeegee on both sides. Remove soap scum, limescale, and other sources of buildup with this easy squeegee for shower doors, windows, tile, mirrors, bathroom, kitchen, decks, patios, and many other surfaces!
【Storable Design】Hanging design, easy to solve the trouble of microfiber pads stains, easy to store, does not take up space, very wear-resistant, suitable for long-term repeated use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The self -squeeze mop does not need to be matched with additional mop buckets. As long as you pull the sliding rod, the transverse scraper and the dense tooth comb can effectively remove stains and wring out moisture. The integrated floor cleaning mop can keep your hands away from dirt, free your hands and keep them clean.

180° flexible rotation, easy to remove skirting, wall seams, ceiling, and other stains along the corners. The mop head thin flat design, you can go deep into the bottom of the furniture low space cleaning.

Comes with 2 microfiber mop pad refills in total. Premium mop pads have good water absorption and can quickly absorb oil, beverage and seasoning stains. Good at picking up all kinds of hair. You don't have to worry about handling pet hair loss. All pads are machine washable. Reusable cleaning mop pads can save you a lot of money.
When finished cleaning, the mop can be stored upright or hung on the wall, not taking up space. The top of the mop comes with a super mini brush to clean windows or desktop crevices
The 180 degree rotatable mop head is suitable for various environments. It can flexibly bypass furniture and table corners and go deep into the bottom of beds, cabinets and TV cabinets.

This is a dust removal mop suitable for home and commercial use. Suitable for wood, tile, laminate, vinyl, cement, marble floor. It can be applied to all kinds of places, such as sitting room, kitchen, bathroom, office, kitchen and glass windows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep your expectations realistic and this is a pretty decent tool
reviews.reviewText: Let us start with the facts. This thing is tiny. It is so small it looks like something that should come as part of a Barbie toy set. But that's the brilliant part about this. It is not intended to wipe the floor. It is for counters and walls or anywhere that is above waste height that needs cleaning and you don't want your hands touching a messy cloth. Think about it, people. You can wipe the counter where somebody just spilled food grease on without getting your hands greasy! For me, that alone is a major plus for me because I hate food grease on my hands! If you consider this as a hand cloth with a handle you will immediately see a lot of use for this. The fact that the pads are reusable and machine washable make it even more convenient. The squeegee will leave a little liquid behind when it is squeezed, but it's not a deal breaker. I mean, how often do you get all the liquid out of a sponge or a wash cloth when you squeeze or twist it to dry it? I think something like this is something that you could keep in any area where quick cleanups are needed. The Verdict: Definite recommendation. Will it hold up with time? We don't know yet and that will depend on how many large spills, what the spill actually is, and how deeply you want that area cleaned with this thing. But based on my own realistic expectations I believe it will last a fair amount of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mini-mop is pretty nifty!This is a very versatile cleaning tool! You can use it on windows, shower doors, mirrors, countertops, tables, you name it. Oh and of course you could also use it on the floor like an actual mop if you really wanted, but you'd probably need to be crouched down or on your hands and knees in order to use this little guy on the floor, so I'd probably only recommend using this for spot cleaning on the floor, if anything.This has a feature where it can essentially wring the water (or whatever fluid) out of itself, which can come in especially handy if you use this to clean up a spill or something.This lil' mop also even comes with a small cleaning brush that's tucked right inside the handle which is pretty slick, if you ask me. I took a picture of the mop and the cleaning brush together if you'd like to see what either of them looks like.I love that this comes with a couple of washable/reusable microfiber pads. Not only are reusable pads more environmentally friendly than disposable ones, they can also save you money over time.I haven't really found anything that I don't like about this mini-mop so far. I woulddefinitely recommend this product! But just make sure that you're aware of what the is before ordering it.I took a photo of the mop right beside an (empty) 16.9 FL OZ standard sized plastic water bottle to hopefully help people get some perspective for the size of this item.P.S. Ignore the review that's hating, they obviously didn't pay attention to what they were ordering. YES, this is much smaller than a regular mop, but that's kind of the dang point, duh!! I mean, right there in the product's name it literally says that this is a MINI-mop 🤦🏻‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So handy for the countertops
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy using this handmop. I store it in my pantry, and I grab it when I need to quickly swift crumbs from the counter, into the sink. I also love this for a quick cleansing of my countertop. My island is pretty big, so this allows me to cut down on energy cleaning, since the arm is nice, and long. Such a great item to keep around for quick cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Way smaller cleaning head than you think
reviews.reviewText: Much to my surprise, the surface area on the cleaning head is absolutely tiny.What would I even use this for?The squeegee works "OK", but still leaves water in the mop head.The plastic of the frame feels really cheap, and even bends easily where the squeegee slot is.Again, I thought the head was going to be larger, by a lot, and actually useful to clean surfaces. This thing feels like a child's toy. At this ridiculous size, I can't think of anything I could clean/mop with this. I'd rather just use a sponge.Definitely would NOT recommend. It's going right into the recycle bin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mini mop is exactly what it is ! It’s lightweight and good for cleaning things here and there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this with the vision of cleaning my windows. This is perfect and small enough to give it a good clean. I like the way it stores too. Let’s see what else I can easily clean with this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this portable squeeze mop. It’s great for small jobs, cleaning glass shower doors and more. I love the self rinsing and driving feature above all else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The head slides in and out easily. The mop pads work well. Comes with wall hook.
